recipesJson.name: Milkshake Madness
recipesJson.author: rougeislander401
recipesJson.description:
Another strawberry banana milkshake! Wanted to try one using MB milkshake so here it goes! This is a collab with @wolfwheeler on the DIY discord, thanks for your help bud! This is currently my favorite ADV and am very pleased with how it came out,  hope you all like it as much as I do!

Note: Increased wf banana custard to 2% and added a 2nd strawberry allowing this to be a Strawberry blind friendly recipe.

reviews.text:
*THIS IS NOT A SHILL*
The creator and I are both different degrees of strawberry blind and were trying to make this work. I get a vanilla and banana malted shake instead of fresh banana in vanilla ice cream which is what we wanted. I pick up the tartness from the strawberries which Iâ€™m not upset about. I like this being banana and vanilla forward with the tart on the end. This one is strawberry blind friendly.
